text: @SenSchumer Do POTUS have a magic wand he can wave & magically produce all the testing that was never invented 2 kill the virus & save the world did POTUS cure all the other disease b/c the only deaths we have had is covid-19 we need 2 give POTUS the Nobel Peace Prize who w/me think about it
